item.title: Grand Canyon West Tour with Hoover Dam Stop and Optional Skywalk
item.description: This Grand Canyon day tour offers an all-inclusive experience with exclusive perks. Avoid the crowds as you travel in a luxury bus, picking up from select hotels in Las Vegas. On the way to the West Rim, enjoy a hot, sit-down breakfast at a restaurant and stop at the Hoover Dam Memorial Bridge for stunning photo opportunities. At the Grand Canyon, you'll have VIP bus access, allowing you to spend more time exploring without the need to transfer to shuttle buses. The tour includes admission to the West Rim, a scenic BBQ lunch on the canyon rim and two bottles of ice-cold water, returning to Las Vegas around 5pm.

image.alt: Grand Canyon West Tour with Hoover Dam Stop and Optional Skywalk

item.title: Grand Canyon West, Hoover Dam Stop and Optional Lunch and Skywalk
item.description: Enjoy a seamless journey from Las Vegas to the stunning Grand Canyon West, one of the most iconic destinations in the world. Relax in an air-conditioned vehicle and spend your day marveling at the awe-inspiring views from Eagle Point and Guano Point, and immerse yourself in the rich culture of the Hualapai Tribe. For an even more unforgettable experience, customize your tour by adding a Grand Canyon Skywalk ticket, giving you a thrilling perspective over the canyon’s edge.

image.alt: Grand Canyon West, Hoover Dam Stop and Optional Lunch and Skywalk

item.title: Half-Day Mojave Desert ATV Tour from Las Vegas
item.description: Experience the thrills of riding an all-terrain vehicle (ATV) through the Mojave Desert on this half-day guided ATV tour from Las Vegas. After meeting on the Strip, you will be transported to just outside the Lake Mead Recreation Area. After an orientation, ride for 1.5 hours on a private track exclusive to this tour.

image.alt: Half-Day Mojave Desert ATV Tour from Las Vegas

item.title: Ultimate Hoover Dam Tour from Las Vegas with Lunch
item.description: Experience a VIP tour of the Hoover Dam with early access to avoid the crowds. Enjoy a guided "Walk on the Top" tour, a powerplant tour inside the dam, stunning views from the memorial bridge, and admission to the Visitor Center exhibits. The tour includes a freshly cooked lunch at a restaurant and a bonus ticket to the LA Comedy Club at The Strat, a $45 value. Hotel pickup and drop-off, bottled water, and air-conditioned transport are all part of this exclusive experience.

image.alt: Ultimate Hoover Dam Tour from Las Vegas with Lunch

item.title: Half-Day Emerald Cave Kayak Tour with Optional Hotel Pickup
item.description: Experience the serenity of Emerald Cave, a picturesque natural attraction on the Colorado River. This kayaking tour takes a small group max of 12 people paddling up the river with a guide. Stop for snacks and swimming along the way. Round-trip hotel transport can be selected as an option from Las Vegas, or you can make your own way to the starting point by rental car in Willow Beach, Arizona.

image.alt: Half-Day Emerald Cave Kayak Tour with Optional Hotel Pickup

item.title: Award Winning 3 Hour Hoover Dam Mini Tour Small group from Vegas
item.description: Explore the Hoover Dam from Las Vegas, even if you have limited time, on this half-day "mini" tour that fits perfectly into your schedule. After leaving the Strip in a comfortable Mercedes Sprinter van, you'll head to the dam, with stops at scenic lookout points for stunning views and great photo opportunities. You can also upgrade your tour to include a stop at the Seven Magic Mountains in the Mojave Desert.

image.alt: Award Winning 3 Hour Hoover Dam Mini Tour Small group from Vegas

item.title: Las Vegas Dunes ATV Tour
item.description: Experience the thrills of riding an all-terrain vehicle (ATV) through the Las Vegas Dunes on this beginner-friendly guided tour. Meet your shuttle right on the Strip and head to the departure point for an orientation and safety demonstration. Then, follow your guide and, zip off into the dunes on your single-rider ATV to explore the rugged desert scenery.

image.alt: Las Vegas Dunes ATV Tour

item.title: Grand Canyon West with Hoover Dam Stop and Optional Skywalk
item.description: Experience the Grand Canyon West Rim on a full-day coach tour from Las Vegas. Travel by bus, passing scenic Lake Mead and the Joshua Tree Forest en route. Explore Eagle Point and Guano Point, or upgrade to a guided tour for deeper insights. Enhance your adventure with optional upgrades like the Skywalk, helicopter, and boat ride below the rim. Enjoy a photo stop at the Hoover Dam on your return journey.

image.alt: Grand Canyon West with Hoover Dam Stop and Optional Skywalk

item.title: Lower Antelope Canyon and Horseshoe Bend Day Tour with Lunch
item.description: "Swap the bright lights of Las Vegas for the stunning natural beauty of Lower Antelope Canyon and Horseshoe Bend on this full-day tour. Explore the iconic Lower Antelope Canyon, guided by a knowledgeable Navajo guide, who will share insights into the canyon's geology, history, and culture. You'll also enjoy breathtaking views of the Colorado River at Horseshoe Bend, one of the most picturesque landmarks in the American Southwest. Everything is included in this tour, ensuring a seamless and unforgettable experience.

image.alt: Lower Antelope Canyon and Horseshoe Bend Day Tour with Lunch

item.title: Las Vegas Desert ATV Experience
item.description: Experience the thrill of zipping around the Mojave Desert when you book this small-group ATV tour from Las Vegas. You’ll be outfitted with safety gear including helmets and goggles and receive a step-by-step orientation on how to ride your ATV. A guide will lead you on a journey into the desert where you'll be able to travel along trails and take in captivating views.

image.alt: Las Vegas Desert ATV Experience

item.title: Grand Canyon West Rim with Hoover Dam Photo Stop from Las Vegas
item.description: Marvel at the incredible scenery of the Grand Canyon’s West Rim thanks to this full-day sightseeing trip from Las Vegas. During your three hours at the Grand Canyon, take a hop-on, hop-off bus tour along the edge of the canyon, stopping at highlights like Eagle Point and Guano Point. Optional upgrades include lunch and access to the Skywalk viewing platform.

image.alt: Grand Canyon West Rim with Hoover Dam Photo Stop from Las Vegas

item.title: Emerald Cave Kayak Tour with Optional Las Vegas Transportation
item.description: Leave the hustle and bustle of Las Vegas behind and get up close with the stunning Colorado River on this half-day kayaking tour. Board your shuttle at Mandalay Bay Resort (if option selected) and travel to Willow Beach, where you’ll receive life jackets and paddles. Embark on a relaxing 5-mile (8-kilometer) journey through Black Canyon, including a visit to the picturesque Emerald Cave. Enjoy included snacks, banana, granola bar and water as you take in the natural beauty around you. Book your Colorado River kayak tour today for a refreshing outdoor adventure!

image.alt: Emerald Cave Kayak Tour with Optional Las Vegas Transportation

item.title: ATV Riding: First Time Rider Course and Guided Tour
item.description: Perfect for all-terrain vehicle (ATV) first-timers, this introductory course will provide a personalized, guided training session before finishing with a ride through the desert landscapes surrounding Las Vegas. Choose from several convenient start times, meet your shuttle in central Las Vegas, and head beyond city limits. With safety gear and one-on-one guidance provided, you’ll have plenty of time to get comfortable on your ATV before taking it for a spin.

image.alt: ATV Riding: First Time Rider Course and Guided Tour

item.title: 2-Hour Exotic Car Driving Experience in Las Vegas
item.description: Hop in your dream car and forget the speed limit with this driving experience in Las Vegas. Choose from a range of different supercars, including Ferrari, Lamborghini, and Porsche, and race around the course for at least five laps. All necessary equipment will be provided, with a race coach in the car to provide advice and support as you reach speeds of up to 130 mph (210 kph).

image.alt: 2-Hour Exotic Car Driving Experience in Las Vegas

item.title: Small Group Grand Canyon, Hoover Dam, 7 Magic Mountains Tour
item.description: Experience the UNESCO-listed wonder of the Grand Canyon and the manmade marvel of Hoover Dam in one day. Make an early start to dodge the crowds and enjoy plenty of time for photo at the Las Vegas Sign, the Seven Magic Mountains art installation, and Grand Canyon West. For the ultimate view, upgrade to include a walk on the Grand Canyon Skywalk.

image.alt: Small Group Grand Canyon, Hoover Dam, 7 Magic Mountains Tour

item.title: Scooter Tours of Red Rock Canyon
item.description: Escape from the hustle of the Las Vegas strip and enjoy a half-day scooter tour of the Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area. Explore the canyon, passing through desert landscapes, red- and buff-colored rock formations, and sandstone and limestone cliffs that reach elevations up to 7,000 feet. All entrance fees plus the use of a helmet, bottled water and a pickup and drop-off from select Las Vegas hotels are included.

image.alt: Scooter Tours of Red Rock Canyon

item.title: Grand Canyon, Hoover Dam View, Skywalk & Lunch Options, Free WiFi
item.description: Discover the beauty of the Grand Canyon’s West Rim with this full-day tour departing from Las Vegas. Travel in comfort in an air-conditioned bus and admire the scenic Joshua Tree Forest in Arizona along the way. At the Grand Canyon West Rim, explore must-see highlights like Eagle Point and Guano Point. On your return trip, enjoy a photo stop at the Hoover Dam bridge. Upgrade option to include lunch, Skywalk, or a helicopter and boat ride.

image.alt: Grand Canyon, Hoover Dam View, Skywalk & Lunch Options, Free WiFi

item.title: The Mentalist at Planet Hollywood Hotel and Casino
item.description: Enjoy an evening of entertainment when Gerry McCambridge—star of 'The Mentalist' and the reality show 'Phenomenon' takes the stage. Known for his comedy, magic and mind-reading skills, he’s sure to excite and amaze audiences during this Planet Hollywood Resort and Casino performance. It’s a night of interactive entertainment with a choice of VIP seating or general admission.

image.alt: The Mentalist at Planet Hollywood Hotel and Casino

item.title: Grand Canyon Deluxe Helicopter Tour with Landing from Las Vegas
item.description: Experience the ultimate Grand Canyon helicopter tour from Las Vegas! Fly over stunning desert landscapes in a sightseeing helicopter and touch down deep inside the canyon for a Champagne toast. Explore the Grand Canyon's breathtaking beauty in luxurious style, with exclusive access to a private bluff. This unforgettable tour includes ample flying time, hotel pickup and drop-off in Las Vegas, as well as complimentary drinks and snacks during your adventure.

image.alt: Grand Canyon Deluxe Helicopter Tour with Landing from Las Vegas

item.title: Bryce Canyon & Zion National Parks from Vegas, Lunch, Free WiFi
item.description: Visit Utah’s Zion and Bryce Canyon national parks in just one day with this full-day tour from Las Vegas. Discover a stunning desert landscape of sandstone cliffs, canyons, mesas, and unusual hoodoo rock formations. Stop at the Visitor Center and Checkerboard Mesa at Zion, and admire the scenery from different viewpoints at Bryce Canyon. On the way, pass by the Virgin River Gorge and St. George.

image.alt: Bryce Canyon & Zion National Parks from Vegas, Lunch, Free WiFi

item.title: Red Rock Canyon eBike Half-Day Tour
item.description: Cruise through Red Rock Canyon National Conservation Area on an electric bike for a 17-mile (27-kilometer) bike tour that follows a beautiful, paved back road. Great for mixed groups, the electric assist means you can pedal as much or as little as you want while riding past petroglyphs, sandstone formations, and Joshua tree forests before returning to Las Vegas. Includes transfers from select Strip hotels.

image.alt: Red Rock Canyon eBike Half-Day Tour

item.title: Grand Canyon, Antelope Canyon and Horseshoe Bend Day Tour
item.description: Explore the Grand Canyon, Antelope Canyon, and Horseshoe Bend all in one day with this small-group day full-day tour from Las Vegas, Get picked up in Sin City and travel by minivan to Horseshoe Bend, Lower Antelope Canyon or Antelope Canyon X, and the South Rim of the Grand Canyon. On the way back to Las Vegas, stop at Seligman or Williams, both little towns on Route 66 with old-American flair.

image.alt: Grand Canyon, Antelope Canyon and Horseshoe Bend Day Tour

item.title: Morning Horseback Ride with Breakfast from Las Vegas
item.description: Saddle up for a scenic and leisurely Wild West horseback ride led by expert wranglers. After your expedition, revitalize with a hearty cowboy-style pancake and egg breakfast. Your tour includes round-trip hotel transport from the Las Vegas Strip to a working horse ranch where you’re treated to gorgeous views of the desert landscape.

image.alt: Morning Horseback Ride with Breakfast from Las Vegas

item.title: Los Angeles and Hollywood Small Group Day Tour from Las Vegas
item.description: Visit Los Angeles on this full-day tour from Las Vegas, limited to just fourteen people for a small-group experience. Traveling with a driver-guide who provides commentary about the city, check out the areas of Hollywood, Santa Monica, and Beverly Hills Rodeo Drive to see top attractions and take in views of the Pacific Ocean. Snacks and lunch are included.

image.alt: Los Angeles and Hollywood Small Group Day Tour from Las Vegas
